definition: (Internet) flash sale/(sports or online gaming) rapid dispatch of an opponent
second (unit of time)/arc second (angular measurement unit)/(coll.) instantly
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely

sentences.english: I'm sure the stock market question will kill whatever interest they have in you.
sentences.chinese: 我敢肯定，股市问题会秒杀任何对你感兴趣的问题。

sentences.english: He got a house from seckilling.
But when the organization was hit by the killer and instant spike and thus injured.
sentences.chinese: 但当于组织杀手交手时被瞬间秒杀并因此受了伤。
他必须秒杀，不然就失败。

sentences.english: He kills those who bully Orihime.
sentences.chinese: 他秒杀了哪两个欺负织姬的女破面。

definition: to hang sb up and beat him
to crush or compact by means of a roller
to be in defiance of the natural order
(neologism c. 2009) don't worry, it's all taken care of
to respond to an assault by killing one's assailant
off the charts/extreme/beyond the normal range of measurement
lit. to see only the other rider's dust and have no hope of catching up (idiom)/to be far inferior
to fling vigorously/fig. to reduce drastically
to blow out/to blow off/(computer games) to zap/(phone) to ring off the hook/to be jammed/to max out (credit card etc)
to explode or burst/to quick fry or quick boil
